user_query: are the large windows that surround their house the couple are largely oblivious to how vulnerable they are in this seemingly innocuous time inhabited by friendly people including gordo hey thank you for the lovely gift that was very sweet but i'm sure that you spoke to simon about that i know it's only when simon's conflict with gordo intensifies does the film take a tonal shift towards darkness and isolation suddenly the couple's lives aren't fueled by mild discontent but rather paranoia and this unnerving sense of danger but we experience this transition through the perspective of robin who has become trapped and even alienated from those around her especially simon who seems to be unconsciously controlling her his dominance within the household is recognized but isn't forced it's organically developed as her emotions and insecurities come second place to his i'll take an apology for that oh this is not about an apology simon this is about you and me you have to do this for us because if you don't at least try to fix this if you don't shh their love still exists but her freedom feels restricted especially with simon's insistence to start a family which robin is accepting of but never seems satisfied with the idea in fact when the tension in their relationship is addressed simon places the blame on gordo which is relatively true but for very distinct reasons it's made apparent that gordo is seeking retribution for simon's bullying and the distressing lies that led gordo to

entities.entity_description: Gordo는 Simon과 과거 갈등이 있으며, Simon의 괴롭힘과 거짓말에 대한 복수를 추구하는 인물이다
Simon은 Robin의 남편으로, 가정 내에서 무의식적으로 지배적인 위치를 차지하며, 과거 Gordo를 괴롭힌 적이 있는 인물이다
Robin은 Simon의 아내로, 주변 사람들로부터 소외되고 갇힌 느낌을 받으며, Simon의 지배 아래 자유가 제한된 것처럼 느끼는 인물이다

relationships.relationship_description: Simon은 Robin의 남편이며, 가정 내에서 그녀를 무의식적으로 통제하고 있다
Robin은 Simon의 아내이지만 그의 지배로 인해 자유가 제한되어 있다고 느낀다
Gordo는 과거 Simon에게 괴롭힘을 당했으며, 이에 대한 복수를 추구하고 있다
Simon은 과거 Gordo를 괴롭혔고 고통스러운 거짓말을 퍼뜨렸다
Gordo는 부부에게 선물을 보내며 그들의 삶에 개입하고 있다
